name: Daily Debug Dash
description:
Note: There is a known issue on the web build where the minimize button for the guide and debug tool windows does not display. The button still works.

It's your first day on the job as a senior debugger. Use the company's 15 year old in house debugger to debug scripts and keep your job.  

Block out you coworkers pesky distractions for a paw-sitive first day at work!

Controls
- Drag and drop code pieces to the appropriate spots
- Remove code pieces by dropping them in the trash.
